hints.title: Exponential KL-Convergence via Mean-Field Analysis
hints.content:
3819: :label: thm-meanfield-kl-convergence-hybrid
3820: 
3821: **Hypotheses**: Same as Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-main-kl-convergence` in [09_kl_convergence](09_kl_convergence):
3822: 
3823: 1. $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave ({prf:ref}`axiom-qsd-log-concave`)
3824: 2. Parameters satisfy Foster-Lyapunov conditions
3825: 3. Noise variance satisfies $\delta^2 > \delta_{\min}^2$ (favorable regime)
3826: 
3827: **Conclusion**:
3828: 
3829: The discrete-time Markov chain $S_{t+1} = \Psi_{\text{total}}(S_t) := (\Psi_{\text{kin}}(\tau) \circ \Psi_{\text{clone}})(S_t)$ satisfies:
3830: 
3831: $$
3832: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi_{\text{QSD}}) \leq e^{-t/C_{\text{LSI}}} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi_{\text{QSD}})
3833: $$
3834: 
3835: where the LSI constant is:
3836: 
3837: $$
3838: C_{\text{LSI}} = O\left(\frac{1}{\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}}\right)
3839: $$
3840: 
3841: with:
3842: - $\alpha_{\text{kin}} = O(\gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}})$ from kinetic operator
